1.label: Basic Set Report Value Sent to Associated Devices
1.description:
Set the value of basic set report sent to the light associated with the sensor in Group 2 (so the light turns on to the selected brightness level). 99 is the equivalent of full brightness in Z-Wave terms.
      default: 99

2.label: Enable / Disable Motion Reports
2.description: Enable or disable motion reports completely. If motion sensor is disabled, the device will not report motion at all to your hub.

3.label: Motion Sensativity
3.description:
Adjust motion sensitivity where 10 is the most sensative setting.
      default: 10

4.label: Lux Level Trigger

5.label: Motion Re-trigger Time

6.label: Lux Reporting Frequency
6.description:
Set lux reporting frequency to decide how often the snesor will measure and send brightness level data to the hub and associated devices.
      default: 30 (minutes)
